about_the_game:
Behind the Scenes: A Stylist's Romance

Discover the Glamorous World of Fashion and Friendship

Step behind the curtain of a high-fashion boutique and experience the glamorous world of fashion and friendship. This captivating DLC for Virtual Girl invites you to explore the stylish world of [Boutique Name] and connect with a diverse group of talented and inspiring women.

About Dressing Room:

  • Fashionable Dates: Experience unforgettable dates filled with style and sophistication, from exclusive fashion shows to glamorous shopping sprees.

  • Shared Passions: Discover your love for fashion, beauty, and creativity, and share your passions with a group of talented stylists and designers.

  • Romantic Moments: Create lasting memories as you build strong emotional connections with your chosen partner.

  • Stunning Visuals: Immerse yourself in beautifully environments and character designs that bring the world of fashion to life.

Perfect for Fans of:

  • Romantic visual novels

  • Dating simulators

  • Fashion

  • Drama and romance

Don't miss your chance to experience the glamour and excitement of the fashion world. Purchase the DLC today and start your own stylish love story!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains full nudity, front and back of several all characters

You can set up a scene and simulate sex with a 3D model.

The animations simulate sexual positions, and it is possible to move the camera freely around the scene, having a complete perspective of the sexual act.

There is nothing forced in the game.

All situations and characters were made just to simulate pleasure in a passionate and light way.

It is possible to see in detail the characters facial expressions and erogenous zones, including genitalias. 

You must be legal age of majority or over to play this game.
